title: Cognizant
summary: Cognizant is an American multinational technology company that provides business consulting, information technology and outsourcing services. It is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, United States. Cognizant is part of the NASDAQ-100 and trades under CTSH.  It was founded as an in-house technology unit of Dun & Bradstreet in 1994,[5] and started serving external clients in 1996.[5]
